name: Product World
tag_list: mobile, enterprise, catalogs, product-selection, apps, multi-channel
overview:
ProductWorld is a simple and low cost way for marketing professionals to create highly searchable catalogs redefined as Apps on smart phones, tablets and web devices.

Have you ever looked for a product on a company’s website or catalog, knowing exactly what you wanted, but were unable to find it and just gave up in frustration?

As frustrating as it may for you, the user, the lack of a good product search tool is a common problem for marketing professionals at B2B companies costing their employers leads, revenues and clients.

This is the problem that we help marketing professionals at B2B organizations solve in a simple and scalable manner.

We solve the problem by using the semantic web, facet search and dynamic product categories to create an easy way for users to discover a product quickly on corporate websites, smart phones and tablets.

Our platform is simple to use because we provide a web based online platform that enables non technical marketing and media agency professionals to easily implement this solution without any coding.

We have made the solution very scalable by deploying a single multi-tenant semantic web triple store database (NoSQL) in the cloud to support thousands of clients and thousands of data structures simultaneously.

In addition we have architected the platform so that multiple partner companies can contribute content thereby creating a networking of partners’ products that are connected across Apps and their respective corporate websites.
